original_text: A certain Kenite man called Heber, did not live with the other Kenites. They were descendants of Hobab, the father of Moses' wife. Heber was living in a tent beside the big tree in Zaanannim, near Kedesh.
korean_text: 모세의 장인 호밥의 자손 중 겐 사람 헤벨이 떠나 게데스에 가까운 사아난님 상수리나무 곁에 이르러 장막을 쳤더라

sentences.original_text: A certain Kenite man called Heber
did not live with the other Kenites
sentences.korean_translation: 다른 겐 사람들과 함께 살지 않았다

sentences.original_text: Heber was living in a tent
beside the big tree in Zaanannim
